category: news
title: "Untether AI Touts “At-Memory” Architecture, Promising Efficiency And Performance At The Edge"
excerpt: "Untether AI recently emerged from stealth and described their architecture as being “At-Memory”, which the company claims will deliver leading performance and power efficiency. Most products that claim the latter deliver relatively weak performance (with the exception of Qualcomm’s CloudAI 100)."
